description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Amman, Jordan. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Central Amman Mövenpick Luxury near Mecca Mall with Onsite Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant heart of Amman at this Mövenpick retreat, perfectly situated in the bustling business district. Enjoy warm Jordanian hospitality and relax with amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre and tranquil spa. Find yourself within easy reach of popular landmarks like the Amman Citadel, Roman Theatre and Abdali Mall, perfect for days exploring the city’s rich history and contemporary culture. Look no further than the onsite dining venues for a culinary journey, featuring The Senate’s all-day dining and Rumors Lounge for a panoramic terrace and shisha menu.

hotels.title: Opulent Jordan Fairmont Stay in the Heart of Amman with Seven Dining Venues & Luxury Spa
hotels.description: Discover five-star elegance where modern luxury meets authentic Jordanian hospitality at this iconic Fairmont retreat. Perfectly situated in the prestigious Fifth Circle, Fairmont Amman places you at the heart of the city’s cultural landscape - just moments from celebrated landmarks such as the Amman Citadel, Roman Theatre and King Abdullah I Mosque. After a day of exploration, unwind at Fairmont Amman Spa, a haven of relaxation featuring vitality pools, salt saunas and traditional hammam treatments. Then, savour the bold flavours of the Middle East at Nur Lebanese, or indulge in premium cuts and expertly curated wines at Salt Steakhouse, among many other delectable dining options.

hotels.title: Jordan Five-Star Urban Oasis in Amman's Old City Centre
hotels.description: Experience the height of Middle Eastern opulence with an escape to the five-star InterContinental Jordan (Amman), an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of the old city centre. Admire authentic design elements inspired by the region's beauty, then cast your eyes across the city thanks to the hotel's perfect positioning atop one of the seven hills of Amman before setting off to explore. Upon your return, make use of the indoor and outdoor pools, award-winning dining and lavish spa.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Jordan City Break in the Heart of Amman
hotels.description: Among endless cream-coloured hills, mighty citadels and sprawling souqs, Crowne Plaza Amman, an IHG Hotel, offers top-notch Arabian hospitality in the heart of one of Jordan’s most intriguing cities. After day trips spent exploring the ancient pink columns of Petra, floating in the Red Sea, or experiencing true desert splendour in Wadi Rum, return and savour sundowners and resplendent sunsets at Black Iris Roof Top bar, or steaks and good scotch at V Lounge & Restaurant.
